alert.note: Alert for Erie; Huron; Lorain; Medina (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 13 at 9:05AM EST until February 14 at 12:00AM EST by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT EST TONIGHT... * WHAT...Lake effect snow occurring. Additional snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches for a total of 4 to 6 inches for today. * WHERE...Erie, Lorain, Huron and Medina counties. * WHEN...Until midnight EST tonight. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Lake effect snow bands have developed this morning and are producing one inch per hour snowfall rates across North Central Ohio. Lake effect snow will diminish later this afternoon before another burst of snow develops for an additional 1 to 2 inches this evening. Visibility will quickly drop to one quarter of a mile in snow bands this morning, especially along the Ohio Turnpike, Interstate 90, US Route 20, and Ohio State Route 2.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
